name: Odicy
tag_list: maroc, travel, riad, marrakech, villa, casablanca
description: Dedicated to the cities of Morocco
overview:
Odicy.com, the online booking agency dedicated to Morocco, launches the new Connexplace affiliation platform!

Headed by Ghali Alaoui and Eric Yvan Gautier, Odicy.com is an online hotel booking agency dedicated to the most famous Moroccan cities. Launched in 2007, the travel website represents one of the best portals to discover the richness and sensuality of the eastern palace style hotels, traditional oriental villas and riads of Morocco. Choose from a vast array of cities, from the most famous to the biggest and trendiest cities such as Marrakech, Casablanca, Agadir or Ourzazate, or set your heart on a small traditional village and learn about local culture with a completely immersed trip to destinations such as Ait Ben Haddou, Chefchaouen or Merzouga. Morocco is the hot new destination in North Africa, well-known around the world with its reputation increasing every day. The company guarantees the buyers the best prices on the travel market, with prices even lower than local booking agencies! Hotels and partners are meticulously selected to maintain a high level of services and activities.
